<title level="1" right="Trait">[Continuous](/Traits.aspx?ID=451)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 553</row>

Continuous events play out during multiple consecutive Event phases until the event has been resolved (see the event's Resolution entry).
name: Continuous
